snippet.title: The Coma: Recut - Announcement Trailer | PS4
snippet.description:
The Coma: Recut is a remastered version of Korean survival-horror cult classic, The Coma: Cutting Class. You can run. You can hide. But can you uncover Sehwa High's darkest secrets and escape the nightmare alive?

https://twitter.com/DigeratiDM

https://www.playstation.com/en-us/gam...

Take the role of Youngho, a hapless student who finds himself trapped in the nightmarish halls of his high school. After drifting asleep during his final exam, Youngho awakes in the school at night. The only problem is... he’s not alone. Relentlessly pursued by a psychotic killer, Youngho must evade his hunter while desperately searching for a way out of the dread-filled corridors and classrooms. 

May contain content inappropriate for children, visit http://www.esrb.org for rating information

All Rights Reserved Devespresso Games, Digerati Distribution
